description: Counts the frequency of each character in a string using dictionary comprehension.

optimal_code.dict_comprehension: char_count = {ch: s.count(ch) for ch in set(s)}

complexity.time: O(n^2) for count method / O(n) using collections.Counter

description: Counts the frequency of each word in a sentence using dictionary comprehension.

optimal_code.dict_comprehension: word_count = {word: sentence.split().count(word) for word in set(sentence.split())}

description: Creates a dictionary mapping numbers to their squares using dictionary comprehension.

optimal_code.dict_comprehension: squares_dict = {x: x**2 for x in numbers}

description: Filters a dictionary to keep only the items with even values using dictionary comprehension.

optimal_code.dict_comprehension: even_dict = {k: v for k, v in original_dict.items() if v % 2 == 0}

description: Creates a new dictionary by swapping keys and values of the original dictionary.

optimal_code.dict_comprehension: swapped_dict = {v: k for k, v in original_dict.items()}

topic: Word count in a string (using split())
description: Counts the occurrences of each word in a string using split() and dictionary comprehension.

optimal_code.dict_comprehension: word_count = {word: s.split().count(word) for word in set(s.split())}

topic: Combine two lists into a dictionary
description: Combines two lists into a dictionary using dictionary comprehension.

optimal_code.dict_comprehension: combined_dict = {keys[i]: values[i] for i in range(len(keys))}

topic: Convert list to dict of squares
description: Creates a dictionary where each element of the list is mapped to its square using dictionary comprehension.

optimal_code.dict_comprehension: squares_dict = {x: x**2 for x in numbers}
